questions.question: Which major tech company recently introduced Xbox Copilot for Windows 11 PCs?
questions.explain: Microsoft launched Xbox Copilot to enhance gaming experiences on Windows 11 PCs.

questions.question: What is notable about DACLab's CO2 removal technology compared to its competitors?
questions.explain: DACLab claims its CO2 removal technology is more energy-efficient than many of its competitors.

questions.question: What concern did Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella express regarding the company’s future?
questions.explain: Satya Nadella highlighted the importance of adapting to the AI era for Microsoft's survival.

questions.question: What recent legislative proposal aims to block online adult content and VPN services?
questions.explain: The recent Online Safety Bill aims to restrict online adult content and access to VPNs.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Microsoft transforming Foxconn’s empty buildings?
questions.explain: Microsoft plans to convert these buildings into one of the world's most powerful AI data centers.
